ConfigInfo.Name: StmExposedConfig 2
ConfigInfo.MethodologyDisplayName: BGP Route Reflector Flow Spec Scale IPv4
ConfigInfo.MethodologyDescription: Identify the highest number of Flow Specs that a BGP Route Reflector can advertise to a set number of client and non-client speakers.

MethodologyInfo.short_display_name: BGP Route Reflector Flow Spec Scale IPv4

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Value: The distribution schedule for the flow specs, which must total 100%

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MethBgpFlowSpecConfig AS SELECT
AS 'Type-1 (%)',
AS 'Type-2 (%)',
AS 'Type-4 (%)',
AS 'Type-5 (%)',
AS 'Type-6 (%)',
AS 'Type-10 (%)'

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 10007
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Distribution percentage for Type 5 Flow Spec

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 10011
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Distribution percentage for Type 10 Flow Spec

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 10009
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Distribution percentage for Type 6 Flow Spec

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 10001
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Distribution percentage for Type 1 Flow Spec

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 10003
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Distribution percentage for Type 2 Flow Spec

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 10005
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Distribution percentage for Type 4 Flow Spec

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Value: Test execution parameters, such as minimum, maximum, and step counts for flow specs, and test duration limits

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MethIterConfig AS SELECT
AS 'First Flow Spec Count',
AS 'Last Flow Spec Count',
AS 'Flow Spec Count Step',
AS 'Session Establish Timeout (s)',
AS 'Advertise Timeout (s)',
AS 'Re-Advertise Tolerance (%)',
AS 'Settle Time (s)'

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 10103
ExpProperties.EpDescription: The Flow Spec Count for the last iteration of the test

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 10101
ExpProperties.EpDescription: The Flow Spec Count for the first iteration of the test

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 10109
ExpProperties.EpDescription: The period of time in seconds that each iteration may wait for all flow specs to advertise and reflect before terminating the test

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 10113
ExpProperties.EpDescription: The time in seconds that the flow specs must not change once they reach their full flow spec count to consider the iteration test complete

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 10105
ExpProperties.EpDescription: The Flow Spec Count step for each additional iteration of the test

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 10111
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Percentage of received routes greater than expected count to be considered a pass

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 10107
ExpProperties.EpDescription: The maximum amount of time to wait for all BGP sessions to establish

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Value: Configures the total number of client and non-client devices to be used in the test

sql_statement.static: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM port JOIN relationtable ON port.handle=sourcehnd JOIN tag ON targethnd=tag.handle WHERE tag.name='ClientPort') AS 'ClientPortCount', (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM port JOIN relationtable ON port.handle=sourcehnd JOIN tag ON targethnd=tag.handle WHERE tag.name='NonClientPort') AS 'NonClientPortCount', (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM port JOIN relationtable ON port.handle=sourcehnd JOIN tag ON targethnd=tag.handle WHERE tag.name='ControllerPort') AS 'ControllerPortCount'
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MethDeviceConfigPerPort AS SELECT
AS 'Controller Count',
AS 'Client Count',
AS 'Non-Client Count'

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MethDeviceConfig AS SELECT `ControllerPortCount` AS 'Controller Count', `Client Count` * ClientPortCount AS 'Client Count', `Non-Client Count` * NonClientPortCount AS 'Non-Client Count' FROM MethDeviceConfigPerPort JOIN MethPortCount

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 10205
ExpProperties.EpDescription: BackendNonClientDeviceCountConfigTable

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 10203
ExpProperties.EpDescription: BackendClientDeviceCountConfigTable

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Value: Common BGP configuration that influence how the test ports perform with the DUT

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MethBgpCommonConfig AS SELECT
AS 'Max Routes Per Update',
AS 'Inter-Update Delay (ms)',
AS 'Connection Retry Count',
AS 'Connection Retry Interval (s)',
AS 'Session Open Delay (ms)',
AS 'Session Close Delay (ms)',
'Version00'
AS 'VPLS Version',
'NoTrafficBinding'
AS 'Scalability Mode',
AS 'MVPN Route Auto Advertisement Delay (ms)',
'True'
AS 'Enable TCP No Delay',
'True'
AS 'Pack Updates Up To MTU',
'False'
AS 'Ignore Attribute Errors',
'False'
AS 'Send Update without Withdraw on attribute change'
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MethIterExpectedTxCount ('Iteration' INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 'Expected Tx Count')
CREATE TABLE MethRTRow AS SELECT 0 AS row

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 10305
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Number of times to retry the connection if BGP OPEN fails

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 10301
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Maximum routes per BGP UPDATE message (useful when throttling route advertisements)

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 10303
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Delay between successive BGP UPDATE messages in milliseconds

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 10307
ExpProperties.EpDescription: The wait-time/interval (in seconds) before retrying a failed BGP Open

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 103015
ExpProperties.EpDescription: BackendScalabilityMode

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 103019
ExpProperties.EpDescription: BackendEnableTcpNoDelay

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 10309
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Number of milliseconds to wait before sending a session starting Open message to pace the DUT

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 103011
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Number of milliseconds to wait before closing a BGP session to pace the DUT

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 103023
ExpProperties.EpDescription: BackendIgnoreAttributeErrors

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 103021
ExpProperties.EpDescription: BackendPackUpdatesUpToMTU

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 103025
ExpProperties.EpDescription: BackendSendUpdateWithoutWithdraw

sql_statement.static: SELECT `Max Routes Per Update` FROM MethBgpCommonConfig
SELECT `Inter-Update Delay (ms)`  FROM MethBgpCommonConfig
SELECT `Connection Retry Count`  FROM MethBgpCommonConfig
SELECT `Connection Retry Interval (s)`  FROM MethBgpCommonConfig
SELECT `Session Open Delay (ms)`  FROM MethBgpCommonConfig
SELECT `Session Close Delay (ms)`  FROM MethBgpCommonConfig
SELECT CASE WHEN `VPLS Version` = 'Version00' THEN 0 WHEN `VPLS Version` = 'Version02' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END FROM MethBgpCommonConfig
SELECT CASE WHEN `Scalability Mode` = 'Normal' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM MethBgpCommonConfig
SELECT `MVPN Route Auto Advertisement Delay (ms)`  FROM MethBgpCommonConfig
SELECT `Enable TCP No Delay`  FROM MethBgpCommonConfig
SELECT `Pack Updates Up To MTU`  FROM MethBgpCommonConfig
SELECT `Ignore Attribute Errors`  FROM MethBgpCommonConfig
SELECT `Send Update without Withdraw on attribute change`  FROM MethBgpCommonConfig
SELECT CAST(`First Flow Spec Count` AS FLOAT) FROM MethIterConfig
SELECT CAST(`Last Flow Spec Count` AS FLOAT) FROM MethIterConfig
SELECT CAST(`Flow Spec Count Step` AS FLOAT) FROM MethIterConfig

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MethRTChartData (Timestamp, BgpSessionsUp, ControllerTxCount, ControllerTxUpdate, ClientRxCount, ClientRxUpdate, ClientRxSettle, NonClientRxCount, NonClientRxUpdate, NonClientRxSettle)

SELECT (SELECT Timestamp FROM MethRawDataRouterUp) AS Timestamp, (SELECT Data FROM MethRawDataRouterUp) AS BgpSessionsUp, (SELECT Data FROM MethRawDataTxRouteCountController) AS ControllerTxCount, (SELECT Data FROM MethRawDataTxUpdateCountController) AS ControllerTxUpdate, (SELECT SUM(Data) FROM MethRawDataRxRouteCountClient) AS ClientRxCount, (SELECT SUM(Data) FROM MethRawDataRxUpdateCountClient) AS ClientRxUpdate, (SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT SUM(Data) FROM MethRawDataRxRouteCountClient) = (SELECT ClientRxCount FROM MethRTChartData ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1) THEN (SELECT ClientRxSettle FROM MethRTChartData ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1) + (SELECT Timestamp FROM MethRawDataRouterUp) - (SELECT timestamp FROM MethRTChartData ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1) ELSE 0 END) AS ClientRxSettle, CASE WHEN (SELECT  `Non-Client Count` = 0 FROM MethDeviceConfig) THEN 0 ELSE (SELECT SUM(Data) FROM MethRawDataRxRouteCountNonClient) END AS NonClientRxCount, CASE WHEN (SELECT  `Non-Client Count` = 0 FROM MethDeviceConfig) THEN 0 ELSE (SELECT SUM(Data) FROM MethRawDataRxUpdateCountNonClient) END AS NonClientRxUpdate, (SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT SUM(Data) FROM MethRawDataRxRouteCountNonClient) = (SELECT NonClientRxCount FROM MethRTChartData ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1) THEN (SELECT NonClientRxSettle FROM MethRTChartData ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1) + (SELECT Timestamp FROM MethRawDataRouterUp) - (SELECT timestamp FROM MethRTChartData ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1) ELSE 0 END) AS NonClientRxSettle
DELETE FROM MethRawDataRouterUp
DELETE FROM MethRawDataTxRouteCountController
DELETE FROM MethRawDataTxUpdateCountController
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MethAuditDataRxRouteCountClient (Timestamp, Source, Data)
INSERT INTO MethAuditDataRxRouteCountClient      SELECT * FROM MethRawDataRxRouteCountClient
DELETE FROM MethRawDataRxRouteCountClient
DELETE FROM MethRawDataRxUpdateCountClient
DELETE FROM MethRawDataRxRouteCountNonClient
DELETE FROM MethRawDataRxUpdateCountNonClient
SELECT  CAST(`Non-Client Count` AS INT) != 0 FROM MethDeviceConfig

sql_statement.static: INSERT INTO MethIterExpectedTxCount VALUES(null,
SELECT CAST(`Type-1 Enable` AS INT) > 0 FROM MethIterConfigurations WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(Iteration) FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount)
SELECT `Type-1 Count` FROM MethIterConfigurations WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(Iteration) FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount)
SELECT `Type-1 Start` FROM MethIterConfigurations WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(Iteration) FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount)
SELECT CAST(`Type-2 Enable` AS INT) > 0 FROM MethIterConfigurations WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(Iteration) FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount)
SELECT `Type-2 Count` FROM MethIterConfigurations WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(Iteration) FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount)
SELECT `Type-2 Start` FROM MethIterConfigurations WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(Iteration) FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount)
SELECT CAST(`Type-4 Enable` AS INT) > 0 FROM MethIterConfigurations WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(Iteration) FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount)
SELECT `Type-4 Count` FROM MethIterConfigurations WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(Iteration) FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount)
SELECT `Type-4 Start` FROM MethIterConfigurations WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(Iteration) FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount)
SELECT CAST(`Type-5 Enable` AS INT) > 0 FROM MethIterConfigurations WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(Iteration) FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount)
SELECT `Type-5 Count` FROM MethIterConfigurations WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(Iteration) FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount)
SELECT `Type-5 Start` FROM MethIterConfigurations WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(Iteration) FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount)
SELECT CAST(`Type-6 Enable` AS INT) > 0 FROM MethIterConfigurations WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(Iteration) FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount)
SELECT `Type-6 Count` FROM MethIterConfigurations WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(Iteration) FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount)
SELECT `Type-6 Start` FROM MethIterConfigurations WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(Iteration) FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount)
SELECT CAST(`Type-10 Enable` AS INT) > 0 FROM MethIterConfigurations WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(Iteration) FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount)
SELECT `Type-10 Count` FROM MethIterConfigurations WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(Iteration) FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount)
SELECT `Type-10 Start` FROM MethIterConfigurations WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(Iteration) FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount)

Children.Name: ProcData: Start Sample Region + Reset Iter Tables

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: ProcData: Start Sample Region + Reset Iter Tables

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MethIterResultsRegionsAndEvents (Start, Advertise, Stop)
INSERT INTO MethIterResultsRegionsAndEvents VALUES((SELECT strftime( '%s', 'now')), null, null)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MethIterResultsSessionsUp (`Verdict`, `Start Time (s)`, `BGP Sessions Established Count`, `Expected BGP Sessions Established Count`, `Session Establish Wait Time (s)`, `Session Establish Timeout (s)`)

INSERT INTO MethIterResultsSessionsUp VALUES('UNKNOWN', ((SELECT strftime( '%s', 'now')) - (SELECT MIN(timestamp) FROM MethRTChart)), 0, (SELECT `Controller Count` + `Client Count` + `Non-Client Count` FROM MethDeviceConfig), 0, (SELECT `Session Establish Timeout (s)` FROM MethIterConfig))

ExpressionCommand.Name: Wait For BGP Sessions To Establish

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Wait For BGP Sessions To Establish

sql_statement.static: UPDATE MethIterResultsSessionsUp SET `BGP Sessions Established Count` = (SELECT BgpSessionsUp FROM MethRTChartData WHERE ROWID = (SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM MethRTChartData)), `Session Establish Wait Time (s)` = ((SELECT strftime( '%s', 'now')) - (SELECT MIN(timestamp) FROM MethRTChart) - `Start Time (s)`) WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(rowid) FROM MethIterResultsSessionsUp)

UPDATE MethIterResultsSessionsUp SET `Verdict` = CASE WHEN (SELECT CAST(`Session Establish Wait Time (s)` AS INT) > CAST(`Session Establish Timeout (s)` AS INT) FROM MethIterResultsSessionsUp ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1) THEN 'FAIL' WHEN (SELECT CAST(`BGP Sessions Established Count` AS INT) = CAST(`Expected BGP Sessions Established Count` AS INT) FROM MethIterResultsSessionsUp ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1) THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'WAIT' END WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(rowid) FROM MethIterResultsSessionsUp)
SELECT `Verdict` = 'WAIT' FROM MethIterResultsSessionsUp ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1

ExpressionCommand.Name: All Routers For This Iteration Came Up

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: All Routers For This Iteration Came Up

sql_statement.static: SELECT `Verdict` == 'PASS' FROM MethIterResultsSessionsUp ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1

Children.Name: ProcData: Generate Event for Start Advertisement

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: ProcData: Generate Event for Start Advertisement

sql_statement.static: UPDATE MethIterResultsRegionsAndEvents SET Advertise = (SELECT strftime( '%s', 'now')) WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(rowid) FROM MethIterResultsRegionsAndEvents)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MethIterResultsControllerTxStats (`Verdict`, `Flow Spec Controller Tx Count`, `Flow Spec Expected Count`, `Flow Spec Tx Rate (Count/s)`, `Flow Spec Per UPDATE`)
INSERT INTO MethIterResultsControllerTxStats VALUES('PASS', null, (SELECT `Expected Tx Count` FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1), null, null)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MethIterResultsClientRxStats (`Verdict`, `Client Rx Count`, `Client Rx Count Expected Count`, `Client Rx Count Expected Count + Tolerance`, `Flow Spec Rx Rate (Count/s)`, `Flow Spec Per UPDATE`)

INSERT INTO MethIterResultsClientRxStats VALUES('PASS', null, (SELECT `Expected Tx Count` FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1) * (SELECT `Client Count` FROM MethDeviceConfig), CAST(((SELECT `Expected Tx Count` FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1) * (SELECT `Client Count` FROM MethDeviceConfig) * (100 + (SELECT `Re-Advertise Tolerance (%)` FROM MethIterConfig)) / 100.0) AS INT), null, null)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MethIterResultsNonClientRxStats (`Verdict`, `Non-Client Rx Count`, `Non-Client Rx Count Expected Count`, `Non-Client Rx Count Expected Count + Tolerance`, `Flow Spec Rx Rate (Count/s)`, `Flow Spec Per UPDATE`)

INSERT INTO MethIterResultsNonClientRxStats VALUES('PASS', null, (SELECT `Expected Tx Count` FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1) * (SELECT `Non-Client Count` FROM MethDeviceConfig), CAST(((SELECT `Expected Tx Count` FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1) * (SELECT `Non-Client Count` FROM MethDeviceConfig) * (100 + (SELECT `Re-Advertise Tolerance (%)` FROM MethIterConfig)) / 100.0) AS INT), null, null)

ExpressionCommand.Name: Wait for BGP Flow Specs To Receive

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Wait for BGP Flow Specs To Receive

sql_statement.static: UPDATE MethRTRow SET row = (SELECT MAX(rowid) FROM MethRTChartData)

UPDATE MethIterResultsControllerTxStats SET `Flow Spec Controller Tx Count` = (SELECT ControllerTxCount FROM MethRTChartData WHERE rowid = (SELECT row FROM MethRTRow)), `Flow Spec Tx Rate (Count/s)` = (SELECT  ControllerTxCount/ (MIN(Timestamp) - (SELECT Advertise FROM MethIterResultsRegionsAndEvents ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1)) FROM MethRTChartData WHERE ControllerTxCount = (SELECT MAX(ControllerTxCount) FROM MethRTChartData WHERE ControllerTxCount >= (SELECT `Expected Tx Count` FROM MethIterExpectedTxCount ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1))), `Flow Spec Per UPDATE` = ((SELECT ControllerTxCount FROM MethRTChartData WHERE rowid = (SELECT row FROM MethRTRow))/(SELECT ControllerTxUpdate FROM MethRTChartData WHERE rowid = (SELECT row FROM MethRTRow))) WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(rowid) From MethIterResultsControllerTxStats)

UPDATE MethIterResultsClientRxStats SET `Client Rx Count` = (SELECT ClientRxCount FROM MethRTChartData WHERE rowid = (SELECT row FROM MethRTRow)), `Flow Spec Rx Rate (Count/s)` = (SELECT ClientRxCount/(Timestamp-(SELECT Advertise FROM MethIterResultsRegionsAndEvents ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1)) FROM MethRTChartData WHERE ClientRxSettle = 0 ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1), `Flow Spec Per UPDATE` = ((SELECT ClientRxCount FROM MethRTChartData WHERE rowid = (SELECT row FROM MethRTRow))/(SELECT ClientRxUpdate FROM MethRTChartData WHERE rowid = (SELECT row FROM MethRTRow))) WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(rowid) From MethIterResultsClientRxStats)

UPDATE MethIterResultsNonClientRxStats SET `Non-Client Rx Count` = (SELECT NonClientRxCount FROM MethRTChartData WHERE rowid = (SELECT row FROM MethRTRow)), `Flow Spec Rx Rate (Count/s)` = (SELECT NonClientRxCount/(Timestamp-(SELECT Advertise FROM MethIterResultsRegionsAndEvents ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1)) FROM MethRTChartData WHERE NonClientRxSettle = 0 ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1), `Flow Spec Per UPDATE` = ((SELECT NonClientRxCount FROM MethRTChartData WHERE rowid = (SELECT row FROM MethRTRow))/(SELECT NonClientRxUpdate FROM MethRTChartData WHERE rowid = (SELECT row FROM MethRTRow))) WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(rowid) From MethIterResultsNonClientRxStats)

UPDATE MethIterResultsControllerTxStats SET `Verdict` = CASE WHEN (SELECT CAST(`Flow Spec Controller Tx Count` AS INT) < CAST(`Flow Spec Expected Count` AS INT) FROM MethIterResultsControllerTxStats ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1) THEN 'WAIT' ELSE 'PASS' END WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(rowid) From MethIterResultsControllerTxStats)

UPDATE MethIterResultsClientRxStats SET `Verdict` = CASE WHEN ((SELECT CAST(`Advertise Timeout (s)` AS INT) FROM MethIterConfig) < (SELECT CAST(timestamp AS INT) FROM MethRTChartData WHERE rowid = (SELECT row FROM MethRTRow)) - (SELECT CAST(Advertise AS INT) FROM MethIterResultsRegionsAndEvents ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1)) THEN CASE WHEN ((SELECT CAST(`Settle Time (s)` AS INT) FROM MethIterConfig) >= (SELECT CAST(ClientRxSettle AS INT) FROM MethRTChartData WHERE rowid = (SELECT row FROM MethRTRow))) THEN 'TIMED OUT (SETTLING)' ELSE 'TIMED OUT' END WHEN (SELECT CAST(`Client Rx Count Expected Count + Tolerance` AS INT) < CAST(`Client Rx Count` AS INT) FROM MethIterResultsClientRxStats ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1) THEN 'EXCESSIVE' WHEN (SELECT CAST(`Client Rx Count Expected Count` AS INT) <= CAST(`Client Rx Count` AS INT) FROM MethIterResultsClientRxStats ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1) AND ((SELECT CAST(`Settle Time (s)` AS INT) FROM MethIterConfig) < (SELECT CAST(ClientRxSettle AS INT) FROM MethRTChartData WHERE rowid = (SELECT row FROM MethRTRow))) THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'WAIT' END WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(rowid) From MethIterResultsClientRxStats)

UPDATE MethIterResultsNonClientRxStats SET `Verdict` = CASE WHEN (SELECT  `Non-Client Count` = 0 FROM MethDeviceConfig) THEN 'PASS' ELSE CASE WHEN ((SELECT CAST(`Advertise Timeout (s)` AS INT) FROM MethIterConfig) < (SELECT CAST(timestamp AS INT) FROM MethRTChartData WHERE rowid = (SELECT row FROM MethRTRow)) - (SELECT CAST(Advertise AS INT) FROM MethIterResultsRegionsAndEvents ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1)) THEN CASE WHEN ((SELECT CAST(`Settle Time (s)` AS INT) FROM MethIterConfig) >= (SELECT CAST(NonClientRxSettle AS INT) FROM MethRTChartData WHERE rowid = (SELECT row FROM MethRTRow))) THEN 'TIMED OUT (SETTLING)' ELSE 'TIMED OUT' END WHEN (SELECT CAST(`Non-Client Rx Count Expected Count + Tolerance` AS INT) < CAST(`Non-Client Rx Count` AS INT) FROM MethIterResultsNonClientRxStats ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1) THEN 'EXCESSIVE' WHEN (SELECT CAST(`Non-Client Rx Count Expected Count` AS INT) <= CAST(`Non-Client Rx Count` AS INT) FROM MethIterResultsNonClientRxStats ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1) AND ((SELECT CAST(`Settle Time (s)` AS INT) FROM MethIterConfig) < (SELECT CAST(NonClientRxSettle AS INT) FROM MethRTChartData WHERE rowid = (SELECT row FROM MethRTRow))) THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'WAIT' END END WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(rowid) From MethIterResultsNonClientRxStats)

SELECT (SELECT `Verdict` FROM MethIterResultsControllerTxStats ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1) = 'WAIT' OR (SELECT `Verdict` FROM MethIterResultsClientRxStats ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1) = 'WAIT' OR (SELECT `Verdict` FROM MethIterResultsNonClientRxStats ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1) = 'WAIT'
UPDATE MethIterResultsRegionsAndEvents SET Stop = (SELECT strftime( '%s', 'now')) WHERE rowid = (SELECT MAX(rowid) FROM MethIterResultsRegionsAndEvents)
SELECT rowid AS 'Iteration', * FROM MethIterResultsSessionsUp ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT `Verdict` = 'PASS' FROM MethIterResultsSessionsUp ORDER BY rowid DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT `Max Routes Per Update`, `Inter-Update Delay (ms)`, `Connection Retry Count`,  `Connection Retry Interval (s)`, `Session Open Delay (ms)`, `Session Close Delay (ms)`, CASE WHEN `VPLS Version` == 'Version00' THEN 'Version 00' WHEN `VPLS Version` == 'Version02' THEN 'Version 02' ELSE 'Version VPLS 4761' END AS 'VPLS Version', CASE WHEN `Scalability Mode` == 'NoTrafficBinding' THEN 'No Traffic Binding' ELSE `Scalability Mode`  END AS 'Scalability Mode', `MVPN Route Auto Advertisement Delay (ms)`, `Enable TCP No Delay`, `Pack Updates Up To MTU`, `Ignore Attribute Errors`, `Send Update without Withdraw on attribute change` FROM MethBgpCommonConfig

SELECT advertise - (SELECT MIN(timestamp) FROM MethRTChart) AS 'value', '#990000' AS 'color', 1 AS 'width', 2 AS 'zIndex', 'dash' AS 'dashStyle' FROM MethIterResultsRegionsAndEvents

Properties.Value: Create Report Chart Non-Client Option Present

CREATE TABLE MethEotResultsConvergenceSummary AS SELECT (SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT MIN(`Verdict` <> 'PASS') FROM MethIterResultsSessionsUp) THEN 'FAIL: ROUTERS UP PHASE' WHEN (SELECT MIN((SELECT MIN(`Verdict` = 'PASS') FROM MethIterResultsControllerTxStats), (SELECT MIN(`Verdict` = 'PASS') FROM MethIterResultsClientRxStats), (SELECT MIN(`Verdict` = 'PASS') FROM MethIterResultsNonClientRxStats))) THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL: FLOW SPEC PHASE' END) AS 'Test Results', (SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT MIN(`Verdict` <> 'PASS') FROM MethIterResultsSessionsUp) OR (SELECT 0 = MIN((SELECT MIN(`Verdict` = 'PASS') FROM MethIterResultsControllerTxStats), (SELECT MIN(`Verdict` = 'PASS') FROM MethIterResultsClientRxStats), (SELECT MIN(`Verdict` = 'PASS') FROM MethIterResultsNonClientRxStats))) THEN 'N/A' ELSE (SELECT (SELECT MAX(c.`Client Rx Count` + nc.`Non-Client Rx Count`) FROM MethIterResultsClientRxStats AS c JOIN MethIterResultsNonClientRxStats AS nc ON c.rowid = nc.rowid WHERE c.`Verdict` = 'PASS' AND nc.`Verdict` = 'PASS')) END) AS 'Maximum Converged Flow Specs', (SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT MIN(`Verdict` <> 'PASS') FROM MethIterResultsSessionsUp) OR (SELECT 0 = MIN((SELECT MIN(`Verdict` = 'PASS') FROM MethIterResultsControllerTxStats), (SELECT MIN(`Verdict` = 'PASS') FROM MethIterResultsClientRxStats), (SELECT MIN(`Verdict` = 'PASS') FROM MethIterResultsNonClientRxStats))) THEN 'N/A' ELSE (SELECT Stop-Advertise FROM MethIterResultsRegionsAndEvents WHERE rowid = (SELECT (SELECT MAX(c.rowid) FROM MethIterResultsClientRxStats AS c JOIN MethIterResultsNonClientRxStats AS nc ON c.rowid = nc.rowid WHERE c.`Verdict` = 'PASS' AND nc.`Verdict` = 'PASS'))) END) AS 'Convergence Time (s)'
SELECT  * FROM MethEotResultsConvergenceSummary

CREATE TABLE MethEotResultsConvergenceDetails AS SELECT c.rowid AS 'Iteration', CASE WHEN MIN(c.Verdict = 'PASS', nc.Verdict = 'PASS', ctr.Verdict = 'PASS', up.Verdict = 'PASS') THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS 'Verdict', up.`BGP Sessions Established Count` AS 'BGP Sessions Established Count', ctr.`Flow Spec Expected Count` AS 'Flow Spec Count', CASE WHEN ctr.`Flow Spec Controller Tx Count` IS null THEN 'N/A' ELSE ctr.`Flow Spec Controller Tx Count` END AS 'Flow Spec Controller Tx Count', CASE WHEN c.`Client Rx Count`  IS null THEN 'N/A' ELSE c.`Client Rx Count` END AS 'Client Rx Count', CASE WHEN nc.`Non-Client Rx Count` IS null THEN 'N/A' ELSE nc.`Non-Client Rx Count` END AS 'Non-Client Rx Count', CASE WHEN e.Stop - e.Advertise IS null THEN 'N/A' ELSE e.Stop - e.Advertise END AS 'Convergence Time (s)' FROM MethIterResultsClientRxStats AS c JOIN MethIterResultsNonClientRxStats AS nc ON c.rowid = nc.rowid JOIN MethIterResultsControllerTxStats as ctr ON nc.rowid = ctr.rowid JOIN MethIterResultsSessionsUp as up ON ctr.rowid = up.rowid JOIN MethIterResultsRegionsAndEvents as e ON up.rowid = e.rowid
SELECT  * FROM MethEotResultsConvergenceDetails
SELECT rowid AS Iteration, * FROM MethIterResultsControllerTxStats
SELECT MIN(`Verdict` = 'PASS') FROM MethIterResultsControllerTxStats

Frontend.Name: StmExposedProperty 900031
Frontend.EpDescription: The AS number used by the DUT, the client devices, and the flow spec controller (non-client devices have a separate configuration)

Frontend.Name: StmExposedProperty 900032
Frontend.EpDescription: First AS number used by the non-client devices

Frontend.Name: StmExposedProperty 900033
Frontend.EpDescription: AS number step used by the non-client devices

Frontend.Name: StmExposedProperty 900034
Frontend.EpDescription: AS number port step used by the non-client devices

Frontend.Name: StmExposedProperty 900041
Frontend.EpDescription: Determines type of VLAN encapsulation for the controller device

Frontend.Name: StmExposedProperty 900042
Frontend.EpDescription: Determines type of VLAN encapsulation for the client devices

Frontend.Name: StmExposedProperty 900043
Frontend.EpDescription: Determines type of VLAN encapsulation for the non-client devices

Frontend.Name: StmExposedProperty 10200
Frontend.EpDescription: Enable/disable selected functions to manage performance (Normal - no performance improvements, No Traffic Binding - disables label processing)

Frontend.Name: StmExposedProperty 90051
Frontend.EpDescription: Select to enable the TCP_NODELAY option to pack multiple updates per TCP packet per RFC 896

Frontend.Name: StmExposedProperty 90054
Frontend.EpDescription: Flag for the test system to send a route update instead of withdrawing the route (flow spec) when NLRI changes

ExpProperties.EpDescription: Client Port
